articles.description: During his visit to India for his musical tour in March 2024, Ed Sheeran also graced his appearance at Kapil Sharma, streaming on Netflix. They turned the show into a musical night with all the desiness!

articles.description: Ratna Pathak, Naseeruddin Shah, and Prateik Babbar debuted at Cannes 2024. For the screening, the actress draped her own saree in a unique pattern and wore a custom-made blouse.
